name: Rocco The Raccoon's Rad-Venture
description:
DESCRIPTION:

CONTROLS:

Keyboard and mouse:

Movement - WASD
Pause Menu - Escape
Enter - Space

Gamepad:

Right Joystick - Movement
Options / Home button - Pause Menu
X / A - Enter
